I don't fully grok the difference between def and abbrev but so far in ch3.5, I have never wanted OrderedPair.toObject to be expanded to {{a}, {a, b}}.

https://github.com/teorth/analysis/blob/460f5dcad9abecb266c484e57cf0d31b8f3f7d04/analysis/Analysis/Section_3_5.lean#L43

When inevitably simp does that expansion, it pollutes the proof beyond the level I want to work at. I can send the PR, just wanted to check that this the right approach (still learning how Lean works).
Yeah this should be a def instead of abbrev
Rado Kirov has marked this topic as resolved.
